object.name: BackgroundTypeWallpaper
object.description: The background is a wallpaper in the JPEG format.
object.html_description: The background is a wallpaper in the JPEG format.
object.rst_description: The background is a wallpaper in the JPEG format.

annotations.description: Dimming of the background in dark themes, as a percentage; 0-100
annotations.html_description: Dimming of the background in dark themes, as a percentage; 0-100
annotations.rst_description: Dimming of the background in dark themes, as a percentage; 0-100
annotations.name: dark_theme_dimming

annotations.description: True, if the wallpaper is downscaled to fit in a 450x450 square and then box-blurred with radius 12
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the wallpaper is downscaled to fit in a 450x450 square and then box-blurred with radius 12
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the wallpaper is downscaled to fit in a 450x450 square and then box-blurred with radius 12
annotations.name: is_blurred

annotations.description: True, if the background moves slightly when the device is tilted
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the background moves slightly when the device is tilted
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the background moves slightly when the device is tilted
annotations.name: is_moving
